data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 SE 8.1
data.actual_result: It only updates if you aren't scrolling anymore
data.expected_result: The bar updates dynamically when you are scrolling
data.short_description: Unread Indicator does not update dynamically while you are scrolling
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server that has a new unreads bar - Click on the bar - Note where it jumps you to - Scroll back to the top - Now scroll back down without releasing - Notice the bar is still there - Release - It's gone
